QuestData.Title: Delivering the Message
QuestData.Description: I'm sending one of my demolitionists out to place the disruption device. Just make sure no harm comes to him as he's placing the disruptor.$B$BKeep him protected! He will not fight back if enemies attack him as he is only a holographic image but the image can be destroyed!$B$BReturn to me once the job is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Image of Commander Ameer at the Ethereum Staging Grounds - Ethereum Transponder Zeta - wants you to escort the Protectorate Demolitionist to the Manaforge Ultris conduit and keep him protected while he works to sabotage the pipeline.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to the Image of Commander Ameer by using the Ethereum Transponder Zeta at the Ethereum Staging Grounds in Netherstorm.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks to you, their plans are in ruin! Now only one thing remains... Salhadaar.
